course_name: World Religions in Youth Cultures Part A
description:
This course aims to introduce participants to history, psychology and sociology of some of the world's major religions. Participants will have the opportunity to engage in comparative studies of religion and modern culture and to develop a rich understanding of the varieties of religious experience.
This course may not be offered if the enrolment is less than 10 students.
restricted: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
